org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.human

Interface HumanDeathEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CauseTracked, EntityDeathEvent, EntityEvent, Event, ExperienceEvent, GameEvent, HumanEvent, LivingDeathEvent, LivingEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlayerDeathEvent

    public interface HumanDeathEvent
extends HumanEvent, LivingDeathEvent
    Called when an Human is killed or removed due to unload.
